mathara uyanwaththa pitiyedi dehiwala es da es jayasinha widuhala inimakin ha lakunu 54kin parajayata path karamin sarweshasaya me jayagrahanaya himikara gaththeya.tharagaye palamu inimata panduwata paharadun jayasinha pila lakunu 116kata dawi giya athara santha sarweshas palamu inimata lakunu 248k ras kaleya.lakunu 132k pitupasin dewani inima arambau jayasinha widuhal pilata siyallan dawi labagatha hakiwuye lakunu 78k pamani.es da es jayasinha palamu inima-116 (oowara 38.2) mahesh piris 42 (chanuka dilshan 20/4) saha dewani inima-78 (oowara 42.3) (sanjika ridma 29/5, chanuka dilshan 20/3)sa.sarweshas palamu inima-278 (oowara 64.3) lochana mohotti 65, kawindu umesh nodawi 46, ruchira jayathunga 36 (mahesh piris 39/5, maduka nirmal 77/3).

dewi mese pawasuwa. 6 “‘obe dewi wana yehowa mamayi.+ oba wahalunwa siti eejipthu deshayen obawa nidahas kale mamayi.+ 7 oba kawadawath ma hara wena kisi dewi kenekuta namaskara nokala yuthuyi.+ 8 “‘oba rupa sada nogatha yuthuyi.+ ahase ho polowe ho jalaye ho thibena kisima deyaka hadayata+ samanawa rupayak sada noganna. 9 ee rupa idiriye wanda wati namaskara nokaranna.+ manda yehowa nam wu obe dewi wana mama wenath dewiwarunta karana namaskaraya dadi lesa heladakimi.+ mata waira karana ayage waradiwalata thunwana ha hatharawana parampara dakwa owunge daruwanta danduwam karannemi.+ 10 namuth mata prema karana, mage aagnya pawathwana ayage parampara dahas gananakata wuwath mama mahath premayak* penwannemi.+ 11 “‘yehowa yana obe dewige namayata apahasa wana ayurin ema namaya sandahan nokaranna.+ yehowa dewi wana mama mage namayata apahasa karana siyaludenatama aniwaryayenma danduwam karannemi.+ 12 “‘obe dewi wana yehowa obata ana kala lesa sabath dawasa shuddha dawasak lesa salakanna.+ 13 dawas hayak pura wehesa mahansi wi wada karanna.+ 14 namuth hathwana dawasedi obe dewi wana yehowa wenuwen sabathak pawathwanna.+ obawath obe duputhunwath obe dasadasinwath obe sathunwath obe nuwarawala jiwath wana wideshikayanwath+ edina kisi wadak nokala yuthuyi.+ ewita obata menma obe dasadasintath edina niwadu gena wehesa niwagatha hakiyi.+ 15 oba eejipthu deshaye wahalunwa siti kalaya+ ganath obe dewi wana yehowa thama mahath balaya+ pamin obawa eejipthuwen nidahas kala aakaraya ganath ee dawasedi mathak karagatha yuthuyi.
